Left 4 Dead is it worth buying in 2019? I think it is worth it because of how easy the game can be run almost on any modern day computer. But if you do have an expensive gaming computer its still good because I think this is like a classic just a good game to have in your library for 99 cents on sale.

Отличная игра, но интересной она станет только в COOP режиме. Игра издали напоминает хоррор, но на самом деле это мясной шутер. В игре есть что-то похожее на сюжет. Сойдет.

Отличный, динамичный шутер. Весело играть в кампании друзей. Неплохая графика, а для 2008 года, так совсем отличная.
Десять зомби из десяти за интересно проведенное время!)

Jogo CooP./ Multiplayer

Com gráficos ótimos para a época do seu desenvolvimento e seguindo uma linha grafica igual ao left 4 dead 2, L4D 1 é um jogo de suspense que prende qualquer um por algumas horas fazendo as missões e resgatando as conquistas, é Leve pesando aproximadamente 3 GB e pedindo pouca exigência dos computadores.
Recomendo, mas busque jogar com mais pessoas tornando o jogo mais interessante e conquistando mais objetivos de conquista.
Muy buen juego, no hay que dudar en comprrlo
Fun game. love to get dragged to my death by a man with a 60ft long tongue.
o jogo é ótimo, mas compre o 2.. as fases do 1 tem no 2, se tiver em promoção então .. so vai.
one of THE best co-op shooters ever made. dirt cheap, amazing with friends, enjoyable, wonderful atmosphere. JUST BUY THE GAME ALREADY

Nice game. Combination between FPS and zombie chaos. Much zombie much fun

Hadn't played this since 2012 so I decided to revisit it.  I played on single player and for the most part the AI bots perform extremely well.  Even on normal mode it's a challenge but not overwhelming.  It's a great zombie shredding game and really just a great game overall.    The game engine is super smooth on my Nvidia 1050 Ti.  Zero lag throughout all the campaigns.  I actually think I liked it even more the second time around.  The only other zombie game that rivals it is Dead Island but that game is a slightly different animal.  Anyway I highly recommend this game and now I'm going to replay Left 4 Dead 2!
